title: 7.10 Patch Fps drops
body: I don't have a good gaming pc but league can run at 25-30 which is better than 5 ,but after this new patch the first thing I notice about it is that it takes hell a long time ( like 5 minutes ) to load the % so I can join game, after I join game I have like 10 12 fps and then it stabilizes until I go to my lane or to my destination, after i play 2 minutes i get a huge drop to 03 fps and then from there it takes 1-2 mins until it comes back to normal , after i go to shop, or buy something I get again this huge drop to 03 then it takes same time to get back to normal, it happens more rarely in teamfights but still I don't enjoy game knowing that in a random moment of fighting i will get 03 fps and lose.This happend once to me like 1 month and half ago and it happend only one day, the next day it was all fine just like everytime.Most of the time when I join game there's a low chance for an enemy or teammate to not tell me that I got a "wooden" pc .I decided to make the thread since I saw a lot of these in other patches, otherwise I wouldn't do it. I hope it doesn't happen for any of u out there but if you already have the same problem as me please comment below.RIOT PLEASE DO SOMETHING.{{summoner:4}}

replies.body: I'd suggest first going into the client options and turning on **close client during game** to see if that lets the game run a little smoother. If that's not helping, run through the steps in our [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) to make sure your drivers are all up to date and configured properly.
My client is always closed during the game {{item:3070}}

What operating system? If it's windows 7 or 10 you push your start button and go to the run commmand. Type in dxdiag and click run. Then when that loads you click display and it tells you what card you have.

Is that screenshot that I just posted, safe to post online?

I just played a game right now and it will probably be my last one for a long time if this thing doesnt get fixed, because its not my pc fault this happend once 2 months ago just after the new patch , next day it wa just the same, no lagg no fps drops, I mean, who does enjoy the game with 3 fps, basicly nobody and its hard to play or participate in team fights or help your team... I don't know what to do im clueless

What type of video card is it? (usually Nvidia or AMD) and you download the tool and it gives you options to run. What you want to do is try telling it to force a repatch and if that doesn't work go ahead and send the logs it gives you to player support.

I Re-Installed the game, does that count instead of re-patching ?
By the way, I'm not sure if I should create an account or find a account online to try to play a game on another server to see if I got the same issue ?

Hello Ron,

Have you tried turning V-Sync off in your options menu? If that doesn't work you could try updating your graphics drivers. If neither of those work, try running the steps here [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and sending those logs to player support.
